pageProduct.name: U by Kotex Slim Tampons Super 32 Pack
pageProduct.description:
General Information

U By Kotex® Super Tampons give you all the protection you need even on the heaviest of heavy days. But super in absorbency doesn't mean super in size so they're still super slim and super easy to use. Their slender tip means it's easier to use while offering you leakage protection with the last line of defence. Wear your favourite pair of undies without fear with U by Kotex® Tampons.

  • Leakage protection with the last line of defence
  • U BY KOTEX tampons offer period protection with oh so slender tip and slim design for easy use
  • Individually packaged with coloured twist-open wrappers
  • Perfect for heavy flow days, with 14g absorbency
  • Come in handy purse packs

This product may not be right for you. Read the warning on pack before purchase and follow the instructions for use.

Suitable For: Heavy Flow

Boxed Contents: 32 Tampons

Size: 32 Pack

Warnings

Tampon use has been associated with Toxic Shock Syndrome (TSS). TSS is a rare but serious disease that may cause death. Read and keep the enclosed information. Please do not flush product or packaging. Do not flush down the toilet. Do not use if wrapper is open or damaged.

Directions

Do not flush
